title: FNSPID: A Comprehensive Financial News Dataset in Time Series
abstract: Financial market predictions utilize historical data to anticipate future stock prices and market trends. Traditionally, these predictions have focused on the statistical analysis of quantitative factors, such as stock prices, trading volumes, inflation rates, and changes in industrial production. Recent advancements in large language models motivate the integrated financial analysis of both sentiment data, particularly market news, and numerical factors. Nonetheless, this methodology frequently encounters constraints due to the paucity of extensive datasets that amalgamate both quantitative and qualitative sentiment analyses. To address this challenge, we introduce a large-scale financial dataset, namely, Financial News and Stock Price Integration Dataset (FNSPID). It comprises 29.7 million stock prices and 15.7 million time-aligned financial news records for 4,775 S&P500 companies, covering the period from 1999 to 2023, sourced from 4 stock market news websites. translated_title: FNSPID：一份全面的时间序列金融新闻数据集
translated_abstract: 金融市场预测利用历史数据来预测未来的股票价格和市场趋势。传统上，这些预测主要集中在对数量因素的统计分析，如股票价格、交易量、通胀率和工业生产变动等。大型语言模型的最新进展激发了对情感数据（尤其是市场新闻）和数值因素进行整合性金融分析的兴趣。然而，由于缺乏综合数量和质量情感分析的大规模数据集，这种方法常常受到限制。为了应对这一挑战，我们介绍了一个大规模的金融数据集，即金融新闻和股票价格整合数据集（FNSPID）。它包括4,775家标普500指数公司从1999年到2023年期间的2970万个股票价格和1570万个时间对齐的金融新闻记录，数据来源于4个股票市场新闻网站。我们证明了FNSPID可以很好地用于金融市场预测。
tldr: FNSPID是一个包含大规模金融新闻和股票价格数据的数据集，覆盖了从1999年到2023年的时间段，适用于金融市场预测。
en_tdlr: FNSPID is a dataset containing a large-scale financial news and stock price data, covering the period from 1999 to 2023, suitable for financial market predictions.
